name: onwards-admin-app
description: Admin platform for Onwards community organization

scripts.dev: npm run build:client && tsx watch --clear-screen=false src/server/index.ts
scripts.dev:detached: bash -c 'nohup npm run dev > dev.log 2>&1 & BGPID=$!; echo "Servers starting in background (PID: $BGPID)"; sleep 1; echo "Check status: npm run dev:status"'
scripts.dev:status: bash -c 'echo "=== Development Server Status ===" && if [ -f dev.log ]; then tail -15 dev.log; else echo "No log file - servers not running"; fi'
scripts.dev:stop: bash -c 'echo "Stopping development servers..." && pkill -9 -f "onwards-admin-app.*npm run dev" 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -9 -f "tsx.*src/server" 2>/dev/null || true; echo "Done"'
scripts.dev:restart: bash -c 'npm run dev:stop; sleep 1; npm run dev:detached'
scripts.dev:clean: bash -c 'echo "Force cleaning all project processes..." && pkill -9 -f "onwards-admin-app" 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -9 -f "tsx.*src/server" 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -9 -f "vite.*--host" 2>/dev/null || true; for p in 3001 8080 8081 8082; do fuser -k $p/tcp 2>/dev/null || true; done; echo "Cleanup complete"'
scripts.dev:health: bash -c 'timeout 3 curl -s http://localhost:8080/api/health >/dev/null && echo "✓ Server OK" || echo "✗ Server down"; timeout 3 curl -s http://localhost:8080 >/dev/null && echo "✓ Frontend OK" || echo "✗ Frontend down"'
scripts.dev:ports: bash -c 'echo "=== Active Ports ===" && netstat -tlnp 2>/dev/null | grep -E ":(8080)" || echo "No development ports in use"'
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server

author: Lucy Needham
